DOC.brief_summary: This trial will test shoe inserts for the treatment of knee osteoarthritis, the most common form of knee arthritis. Those with disease on the inner (medial) aspect of the knee will be studied.
DOC.brief_title: Shoe Inserts for Treating Osteoarthritis of the Knee
DOC.criteria: Medial knee osteoarthritis Pain No foot problems Lives in Boston, Massachusetts Metro area
